output.sentences: Wow people were coming on bikes to see this race.
People lined the route to see the runners as they traveled through the city.
Runners come from all over the world to participate in this marathon.
At the end of the route people have to pace themselves to make it to the finish line.
The race is over, the crowds are gone and sanitation is left with a job to do.
